about_the_game:
Bonk It!: Reaching the Summit Has Never Been This Fun!

Find yourself trapped inside a cauldron, armed only with a hammer, as you attempt to overcome the obstacles in your path! Offering a fun yet challenging climbing adventure, Bonk It! can be played solo or with friends. If you fall, start over, learn, and try again. Experience the thrill of climbing higher with every step!

Will Your Friends Be Your Foes or Climb Together?: In multiplayer mode, you can play with up to 4 friends. Team up and help each other ascend, or leave your rivals behind and reach the summit solo! But beware, things can quickly turn chaotic, and cooperation might turn into competition.

Explore a Vast and Colorful World: Discover a stylized, expansive map made up of diverse biomes. Towering mountains, volcanic areas, lush forests, and many more colorful regions await you. Each biome is filled with its own dangers and opportunities, offering a new adventure around every corner.

Choose Your Cauldron, Hammer, and Hat: Express your unique style! Bonk It! features a variety of cosmetics; customize your character with different cauldrons, hammers, and hats. Make your climbing experience stand out with your distinctive look!

Fun and Strategy Combined: What starts with simple controls evolves into a journey that requires strategy and skill. Every move counts; a small mistake could send you back to the starting point. But remember, every fall is a lesson, and every new attempt brings you closer to the summit.

Get Ready to Laugh!: As you play, you'll share plenty of laughs with your friends, enjoying the falls and failed attempts. But when things get serious, who will be the first to reach the top—you or your fellow climber?

Bonk It! brings together the chaotic fun of climbing and competition. Try to reach the summit in a challenging world, either with your friends or against them. Are you ready?

name: Bonk It!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K or AMD Ryzen R5 1600 processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600 processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
